songs.lyrics:
I swig from hallowed ground
This beast is gonna make it
And ride your caitiff lives
The fields vacant graves
That chide the hoggish leech
I’m the one who takes it all
The raving light of day

I see you’re bloody frail
The sort that makes me revel
Cane in, suck up the foam
I heard there’s no one there
To teach the only truth
I’m the one that shines forever
The raving light of day

Addled, but not to blame
Everywhere I go blood drowns my trail
Benign rulе, tired eyes drеam on
For the piously raving
Won’t decay

Pick the side
Cut up these fools and fight
The bitch knows no shame
They seek it in our wells
I’m the one defiant heart
The raving light of day

Suit yourselves
My drooling right
Preaching from the grave
You seek a better, you seek a decent life?
Hear my counsel, I must know
I’m the raving light of day

Addled, but not to blame
Everywhere I go blood drowns my trail
Benign rule: tired eyes dream on
For the piously raving
Won’t decay

We read it in your face:
Bloomed, so weak, it all decays
In your rule, in my heart
Wish you the best, make it a start

They only maim
When you’re lonely
One day we will see you there

On a warded isle
Rotten and frail
One can always hear you pray
Bleat! I’m not to blame
Everywhere I go blood drowns my trail
Benign rule, lift the darkest veil!
For the piously raving
Won’t decay

Addled, but not to blame
Everywhere I go blood drowns my trail
Benign rule, tired eyes dream on
For the piously raving
Won’t decay

I’ll stay and wheeze: “Hail the Fane
Pick up your entrails
More to see
Ailing love comes your way

I won’t decay”

Grab your bracelet
Hope you will forgive
Ain’t no time to save you
Hold my breath as they

Rush past this damp den
Beat myself alive
Stopped the bleeding
Now run, get out of here

Who’s the last?
I call you to my side
Eat flowers on your path
I cannot have you blind all the time
Lest you fail me, my dear
Dazed; time is flying
And I, I watch you
As you’re crossing iron plains

Light stings my eyes
I weep and stumble on
Cave roof’s collapsed from ray-streaked ruins
Your temple beams at me

They can’t close in, so take it easy now
Fool of great insight
Unbroken guard, awake all night
So still and silent?
Must be gone; woken by rain, now, did I die?

Who’s the last?
I call you to my side
Eat flowers on your path
I cannot have you blind all the time
Lest you fail me, my dear
Dazed, time is flying
And I, I watch you
Crossing iron plains

The creep of night
You heal
The sleep is mine
Found your lair, feel not a single limb
I just see things differently
Oh, bold vertigo

Who’s the last?
I call you to my side
Eat flowers on your path
I cannot have you blind all the time
Lest you fail me, my dear
Dazed, time is flying
And I, I watch you
As you’re crossing iron plains

albums.albumName: Blood Hails Steel - Steel Hails Fire

songs.songName: Blood Hails Steel - Steel Hails Fire

songs.lyrics:
Perched on jagged cliffs
Kerszh looms above the shades
Where in the mangroves
Vermin slither through the glades

Once the masters ruled us all
Now they are breeders of an ill doctrine
We’re forced to act, decisive, clandestine

We are stacking pyres
For a most noble cause
We all have come together
Yes, without these freaks the world will better

The healing power: blood lies
Sweet whispers to raise the heat
Harken to the glorious sound!
To battle! Wither with me!

In the black of night
We prepare the vulture’s feast
Cut down the guards on my command
Unseen: the wave that sinks the land

They use our skin for parchment
Young fat for secret potions
Rancid temple; burn the wisdom!
High time to rush into oblivion

We shall return to the sea
Stride down the old path
Towards sunken graveyards

We shall return to the sea
Recite this obituary
And live complacently

In the black of night
We prepare the vulture’s feast
Cut down the guards on my command
Unseen: the wave that sinks the land

To all who lurk and couch tonight
I light a greeting fire
I count on you to flush the land
A hidden wave at my command

Alliance: dark and foreboding
Blood: the currency of power
Woe to those deserving!
Gaze at the plunging breaker!
I’m no minion
I chase dominion

In the black of night
We prepare the vulture’s feast
Cut down the guards on my command
Unseen: the wave that sinks the land
To all who lurk and couch tonight
I light a greeting fire
I count on you to flush the land
A hidden wave at my command

Lust for dominion
Raze the gates
My assiduous minion!
Sweet whispers raise the heat but
Cold is my blood

At the waterfront, the waves assault
Walls of rock in suicidal frenzy.

Eons of war, until the cliffs bow to the sea.
Blue maws close, drooling with unrelenting jaws.

Breaker, I’m sentient.
In my veins runs violence.
I’ll hit granite and if I am to be crushed:

Belt out chants of war,
Songs of victory,
And stir the maelstrom with your roar
To erase our untimely gloom.

Impregnable forts defend the high ground.
But we are like the surf, will never run dry.

Exult and recite! No doubt you will join the fight.
To lofty hymns, our armies clash.

Lo and behold the wonder: all the lives linked by fate.
And all those we break reverberate,
Are uplifted by the roar,
The chants of war,
The songs of victory.

With ardent zeal, we fall. So bright.
And I see the shoals, endless; one world shining. We have veered off the gray fog.

Prane Koren leads. Soon we shall break down another wall.
We just go where the flames blaze and shut up the sobs. Seems to be all we ever knew.

If you need a solution, start prowling the ruins humming a song.
And all those who chant wring peace from folly.
And all those who sing cannot be overcome.
Cheers for the roar,
The chants of war,
The songs of victory.

In golden liquid, I
Numbly drift away as time slips right through my closing fists.
Tell me about the light in the crevice
Where leeches dwell.
My sight blurs. Must I dive down
To this riverbed?

On glowing currents, habeli rides my mind.
Dissolved lore represses grief. My scars fade away.
The Giver’s embrace reveals Neekog’s true face.
Am I destined to be the League’s last devotee?

I don’t float alone. All the sages that I have slain swim with me again.
Under aureate streams glitters your eternal realm, untouched by the shadows
Of the Torch where you burned in vain.

Serene wit,
I fully backed the schemes of my one true love.
I was enthralled by our people’s deal and if she were alive, I’d have never left her side.
So, I strayed…

The Giver seeps through our ways,
Gnawing laws; a favor!
The ulcerous past and future are gone and
The now has escaped to nowhere.

Well, you lead me astray, cannot feel my body’s frame.
I sink down, tranquilly, was never offered a more convincing aim.
Hold on friend, that soul can feel me.
A gentle touch and it says that it used to feed on pain.
I pet its belly and reply: I found no repose
In all the dying that I’ve seen. Only here the anguish fades away.

Hence, I dream all night.
The cycle can never die.
And how I marvel at the Brewer’s wisdom.

Who can breed,
Ignite the spark of innocent life?

The Giver’s flow is without end,
Will last inside the heart, which is purely given away.

As I drink, quiescence comes to me.
And as I drink, my vision settles.
I am wide open.
United, cannot be dissected.
Analysis; futile exercise.
A sudden retch, and saliva wets the beach.
Finally, I regorge. Astounded eyes blink moistly. All curled up,
Beauty beholds the light of day.
Once, I was driven by vengeance, now, I give life.
Embraced, given peace. The wheel is nudged, can’t be stopped.
